lead_paragraph: Stephane M’Bia and Cameroon needed extra time to beat Tunisia, 3-2, and reach the semifinals at the African Cup of Nations in Kumasi, Ghana.Defending champion Egypt also advanced, beating Angola, 2-1. Cameroon will face host Ghana and Egypt will play Ivory Coast in Thursday’s semifinals.
